As usual it wasn't the biggest or best, but a sign from the stars who would be the next in line for chiefly duties. Your color? A dark green. Your height? A little shorter than normal, but not by much. And as for looks, you were handsome, as the hero of the story usually is, and at this moment looked like you could split into four and a half different yoshis if you divided your weight. As it was said you were pudgy before all this, then soon after you got fat, then you just got huge! Then again the women seemed to like a huge yoshi, as they still couldn't keep their hands off you, or your moobs, or your belly, or even your feet... it seems like they have varying degrees of fetishes in your tribe.

Currently you were with two other yoshis in your hut, a fairly pudgy male and a skinny by yoshi standards female. The male had been a friend to you since you both hatched, and he was a bouncy active kid turned slow mature adult. The female was another friend, though one you did not like much for certain reasons. A conversation was taking place between the three of you, one you found repetitive and boring, but important none the less. You'd rather be asleep right now, curled up nice and close next to one lucky gal... or guy, you weren't picky.

As for the conversation, it was about...

113.content:
You never knew where they got the term wet behind the ears until you showed up at the sacred hut at the edge or Cookie Mountain. It may have been from the fact you were incredibly nervous from finally beginning your training or it might have been the fact you were uncomfortably close to an active volcano, but whatever the case you were sweating, though as a Yoshi you didn't have any ears to begin with.

Becoming the chief of the village had always excited you in the past, but you never expected to have to do any training. Nobody ever told you about it, not even the last chief then the Yoshi Village Shaman came to you just the other day to inform you of your training. He said it would be the most important training you've ever done. Quite a way to put the pressure on a person.

Your stomach growled as you felt your stomach rumble. You were so nervous you skipped breakfast this morning and you weren't allowed to bring anything with you save the shoes on your feet.

"Greetings! Young chief are you ready for training?" shrieked the Yoshi Shaman at the entrance. His words scared you so badly you practically jumped out of your skin. He chuckled a bit at your reaction. The old Yoshi enjoyed scaring all the other Yoshis like that and even a cheif-in-training was no exception.

"Uh, hello," you told him. "Before we start, can I get something to eat?" You held your stomach as it gave a painful gurgle. "I'm starved."

"That is quite alright," he told you. "Because...
113.title: Shaping a Chief

choices: "Sure, let's get started."
"Not yet, I'm still hungry."
1131.content:
You are so thrilled upon hearing those words that the Shaman may never forget the look on your face. You just can't wait to find out what exactly kind of feast is in store for a brand new village leader. You pat your grumbling stomach with an odd satisfaction, as if to reassure it that everything will be fine. He leads you inside the hut to a broad table inside a large room, stacked with more fruit than you had ever seen in your lifetime. You find yourself in a daze just staring at the bounty and cannot do so much as try to stop yourself from drooling. The Shaman brings you to an open spot on the table and pulls up a chair just for you.

"It's all yours," He tells you, "Dig in."

You know exactly where to start, lashing your tongue out at a watermelon as big as your head. You then rapidly spit out the seeds one by one to the delight of the normally stone-faced Shaman. You then peel a bunch of bananas and gobble them up one by one, tossing the skins to the side. Next, you toss several apples into the air and catch them with your tongue. The Shaman takes notice of your appetite and approaches you the next moment you come up for air. Content with your meal so far, you thank him by rubbing your stomach in his presence.

"Man, you were hungry!" He exclaims, chuckling.

"I'd never had a breakfast quite like this," You announce, ending with a hiccup.

"So, are you ready to begin your training?" He wants to know.
1131.title: A Feast Fit for a Chief

choices: I brewed up a potion after years of study
I discovered a method of eating and exercise that lowers your metabolism
1132.content:
"exuse me?" You tilt your head a little.

"And say I'm going deaf, we need to get your shape out of shape I said."

"And what exactly does that mean?"

"It means that you don't look the part of a good chief yet." He replied.

Look the part? What did you not have? You were just like any other yoshi on the island, save for the former chieftain...

"Wait a second, a chief has to be fat?" you say. That idea did not sit well with you at all, you saw the former chieftain was pretty hefty. He had to be the size of four yoshis. You just could not see yourself bulking up to that weight, in fact you didn't really want to at all. You weren't the most toned yoshi on the island, but you weren't going to throw away what slim figure you have.

"Oh quit your whining, kids these days." The shaman rolled his eyes. "It's imperative that a chief reaches a certain size before he can rule."

"But...I mean, can't we change that?" You stammer.

"Ah, but you need to realize, that you are not only a leader, but a symbol." He started. "The wealthier and more prosperous a yoshi tribe is, the bigger they can make their chief."

"That sounds ridiculous, this isn't the ancient days where if tribes didn't work they starved."

"None sense you foolish boy, do realize that there are only a few tribes who have achieved that status?"

"...no." You reply. "But this is still stupid, why should I have to do that for the sake of bragging rights."

"It's not just bragging rights boy, but the most prosperous nation gains favor of the elder stars. You get five wishes to use on your whim."

That caught your attention. Now a wish was something worth ones life. You just had to get really fat and you got five wishes. Hell after you got your wishes you could get rid of this stupid system once and for all. You smile to yourself and look at the shaman.

"Alright now that sounds more like it, when do I begin?"

"Ah I knew you were a smart one, come with me and I'll set you on track." He replied as he led you down a path. "I have planned a new training regiment for you, since our last chief was unable to win, hard as he tried. I have perfected a method that will lower the difficult yoshi metabolism, and after a few days of that you will be well on your way."

"And how do you propose to do that?"


"Well..."

123.content:
"...And so, the little yoshi was able to do what the other yoshis told him he couldn't do. The end." "Yay!" You close the book and gave your little princess a gentle kiss on the cheek. You are a very obese king. A green yoshi with a little difficulty walking around. Everyone respects you nonetheless though, as your are still a king of your own kingdom. Your daughter, a young pink yoshi, gives you a hug. You hug her back and turn off the lights as you leave her room. Thankfully, your room is right next to the princess' room. As you walk, your belly jiggles with every step. You enter the room and see your wife, a blue yoshi, who's also the queen, lying in bed, waiting for you to join her. "So, how did the story go?" "It went well. She fell asleep the moment I kissed her goodnight." You get into bed, which groans a bit from your weight. "You're such a good father, you know that?" "Yeah, I guess so." As the two of you get tucked into bed, you start reminiscing about how you started out as the new king.

When you were crowned king, you were as slim an any other yoshi in the kingdom. Things were a bit difficult at first, with all the decisions you have to do, and having to listen to all the people's problems. But the benefits of being king helped make it all more bearable...And kinda added to your shape as well. Then, that's when you met her. The love of your life, Helena, your wife and queen. She never even once complained about how you were 'growing' into your new position, and she always knew what to say to you. After a while, your daughter Elaine just...well, she just happened! Neither of you minded, as you were both already thinking about starting a family anyway. Whenever she wanted a big dessert that she couldn't finish, she would ask you to eat the rest that she couldn't eat anymore. This, plus her puppy dog eyes when you say no the first time, has added to your frame over the years. Eventually, that dreadful day when you find out that all your clothes have 'shrunk in the wash' has come, and walking has suddenly become so much harder came by sooner or later. One thing was certain though, no one minded having a tubby king. Especially Elaine, as she would spend hours playing with your stomach to keep her happy.

The next day, you wake up with Helena already getting dressed for the day. You follow suit and creep inside your daughter's room to see if she's awake yet. As you open the door slightly, you see her sleeping so peacefully in her blanket. You walk next to her, give her a good morning kiss, and watch as she wakes up and hugs your round midsection. "Good morning daddy!" "Good morning my little princess. It's time for breakfast, so get ready now." She gets up and opens her dresser. You help her get dressed and the two of you make way for the dining hall. The servants all bow to you as you pass by. As you reach the long table, you see Helena already telling some servants to get the food ready. You all sit down and wait for the food to come. When it does come, you notice that...

A new, uneventful day began, and you took your daily walk about the castle. You thought once again how if you were like your father these walks would either be shorter or nonexistent. Your walks normally led you through the courtyard, through the kitchens, and finally into your son's room to wake him up and give him a morning hug. You strolled through the gardens for a nice breath of fresh air, a pass by the kitchen told you what the chefs had planned for the day, and finally you were led to your son's bedroom to wake him up. His face looks so peaceful in his sleep, and you brace yourself for a grumpy awakening as you start opening his curtains. And audible groan comes from the bed as the sun hits his chubby face.

"Daaad... I told you to stop waking me up like that..." The lazy voice he gets in the morning always makes you want to giggle when you hear it. By the way he says it like that it sounds like you wake him like this every morning, when in reality this is about the fourth time you've done it ever. He always acted so lazy, it was kind of adorable actually. You approached his bed as he sat up and rubbed his eyes. You open your arms for that daily hug you always ask from him. He rolls his eyes and reluctantly gives you one. This embrace was one of the few things you asked from him, the others being that he always love you as you love him, and that he keep up with his lessons. You hugged for awhile and notice that...

13.content: King Bowser, what a man. A glorious ruler of a glorious kingdom with a large army that will listen to anything he says. You (or possibly a past king) were given power of an island of yoshis which was quickly turned into a kingdom worthy of Bowser. You have been ever grateful toward him and always feel that no matter what happens you will never be able to repay him. Not that you mind really, he is a handsome man to work under, and smart to boot! But when you think about it some nights one question always comes to mind. How is it that one, sometimes two, plumbers can beat him? Every time you hear their name or think about how they've thwarted your great lord's plans it just makes you angrier. But we are getting ahead of ourselves. Let's establish a beginning first.

"Cakes, pies, jello, cookies, brownies.  All the sweets a sweet king desires!"

131.content:
It was another glorious day for this tyrant as everything ran like clockwork. You got up and had your servants carry you as you prepared for your day. Three carefully held you at your meaty hips and thighs while another two tended to your massive belly that had grown from a slightly pudgy paunch into what you've declared a royal treasure. The Yoshi's beneath you are careful to avoid dropping you or even making the ride anything but smooth. They know the penalty for displeasing you from the Yoshi's they've replaced and knowing your belly grows larger by the day it is a job that grows increasingly difficult.

Once you've freshened up and adorn your royal outfit it's time to sit on your throne. Even for your size it's quite massive, but you've started filling it nicely. You give your belly a little rub and marvel at it's greatness. If anything was a physical representation of your corrupt and twisted empire that was solely there to satisfy your every desire it was that mammoth gut. The rest of your body was fattening up as well, but nothing else could really compare to it.

"Perhaps I should change my ways and be a good king?" you asked yourself. "Perhaps hit the gym and get into shape. Yeah right! In a pigs eyes!" You laugh hoggishly as you think such a ridiculous thought. You always do that every day to get yourself in a good and hungry mood. In fact, speaking of hungry it was time to ring the royal bell. You grab a nearby rope and pull it down sounding a belly that is heard down to the kitchen. Remember the Yoshi's that were afraid to fail their king? Well the one thing worse than carrying him around was feeding him. It was a 24 hour job meaning they barely got any sleep needing to tend to his every craving whether it be in the middle in the afternoon or at the dead of night.

As your waiter came to get your order he asked. "What is your stomach's desire, my lord?"
131.title: Royal Pain

choices: At how big you've gotten, you were so skinny as a child."
At how much you haven't changed, you're still bigger than me!"
That you haven't yet found a queen, after all you are a handsome young ruler."
132.content:
"Sir, maybe you should sit down and stop worrying so much about lord Bowser's visit." The short yoshi walking beside you was the most trusted yoshi that served you, after all you've known each other since you were babies. Ever since you were both children you remember him being much shorter than you, and most yoshis in general. Not only was he short, he was also very chubby even for a normal yoshi. He was very smart, so smart that he seemed to know everything, which was slightly creepy in your opinion. When you became king you almost instantly appointed him your right hand man. It wasn't just because he was your best friend, or because he was intelligent, it was because he knew you. He knew what you liked, he knew how to speak to you at any time, and above all he knew when you needed advice. He always won any arguments between you two, but this time you were in too much of a panic to let him win.

"No! I have to make sure it will be the best visit the king will ever have!" You made your way to the dining hall with your friend to check on the decorations. "We have to make sure EVERYTHING is right! If not then... Oh I'm not sure what could happen!"

"But sir, Bowser's visit isn't for three more days. I sincerely believe you should go take a nap, I know you and I'm fairly sure you didn't get any sleep last night." Once again he was right, though this time it was easy to tell, you certainly looked like you didn't have a great night.

"How could I sleep knowing the greatest king to ever live was visiting? Besides I had a lot of coffee this morning, I'm wide enough awake to last the rest of the day."

"Yes and it also looks like you've been eating a few donuts as well." He patted your gut to accent his point, not that it was really needed, after all you grew a lot since the beginning of your time as a tyrant. Of course it didn't really bother you, in fact you liked it, it made you look more kingly.

"Yes... well look at you? You look like you spend more time eating than even me, tubby." You poke his gut back to make your own point.

"Well be that as it may at least I'm not as big as you." Suddenly he got a far look and said, "You know I'm actually kind of suprised...
132.title: Readying a banquet

choices: Your food arrives and you start scarfing it down immediately.
Your foods isn't here yet, but now you're feeling a lot hungrier.
Your friend tries to calm you down again.
1321.content:
"I haven't gotten that big... have I?" you ask as take the time to look at your own body. It had been a while since you actually took notice of it, not since you were given this position actually and was loaded with all kind of responsibilities. Back then you were as thin as normal, but somehow between that short time you started to pack on the pounds to the point of growing quite a bit rounder and softer. "You think it's just my metabolism slowing down with maturity or could it be a glandular problem?" In your panic you pulled lever, signalling for a servant to come aid you. "Oh, King Bowser won't be happy if he finds out there's something wrong with me."

"Get a hold of yourself," your friend says grabbing your shoulders to keep you still. "You're perfectly fine. The only problem is your worrying yourself obese."

"What are you talking about?" you ask confused.

"I didn't want to bring it up since I thought a bit of pudge might be good for you and you would learn to mellow out, but I'm starting to see this is something that you need help with. When you get nervous you can't sleep and you probably do a whole lot of things you don't even realize. For instance, you start calling in servants to bring you food."

"Don't be ridiculous."

"Then why did you call a servant in here for?"

As the servant arrived, you listed off a list of foods, drinks, and snacks you desired and sent them off. It was only when they left that you saw what your friend was talking about.

"You're right. The second I get nervous I try to calm my nerves with food."

"Yeah, and the more nervous you get the more you order. It wasn't too problematic before, but his whole matter with King Bowser's visit is pushing it to dangerously high levels. You should just relax and let me handle it."

"I guess you're right," you replied and gave a sigh of relief. "I doubt King Bowser would like to see me fat as a cow."

"Sir," said a messenger rushed to you. "I have an important message for you."

You took the message and gave him a coin for his work. You're calmed mood was suddenly shattered by nerves as you read the message.

"What's wrong?" your friend asked.

"T- t- two days? King Bowser is coming a day earlier!" And just like that you were feeling more nervous than ever before.
1321.title: Stressed Out.  Fattened Out

choices: You get back in bed and leave the supervising to your buddy.
"No, I feel like I should still supervise. I'll sleep tomorrow."
13211.content:
A stout looking red yoshi (probably the chef, you couldn't remember) came in the room followed by a few servants, all of them holding platter of some sort of food or drink. One yoshi had a plate of sandwiches, another had a dish with a variety of little snack foods, the third had a plate with a large pitcher of milk (which was odd, but you didn't much care), and two had whole platters of desserts! "Sir, we have the food you ordered." The stout yoshi seemed pleased with the way you nearly tore into the entire meal. Yeah, he definitely had to be the chef.

You instantly dug in to the meal, trying to lower the stress of the looming banquet by doing what has recently come naturally to you. Eating. The chef had outdone himself with the food, everything tasted better than usual, like he had prepared it for Bowser himself. This fact just made you eat faster, and before you knew it, everything was gone. You scarfed down the sandwiches, ate every snack, drank the entire pitcher of milk, and devoured the two plates of dessert. When you came back to the world of the living, the chef, the servants, and your friend all looked at you incredulously. "Uh... sir, maybe we should get you to your room for a little a rest, and I'll make sure the decorations are sped up." The food stupor you were in made you agree with the short yellow yoshi and he led you to your royal bedroom. Your friend got you laying down in the bed, and he made sure you were absolutely comfortable before he left.

Then about ten seconds later your eyes shot open, and you jumped (as much as a yoshi your size could) out of bed and startled your friend. You were instantly aware of the banquet that had to be ready in three days. No... not three days. You remembered, and all your stress instantly came back with full force. "TWO DAYS!!! HE'S COMING A DAY EARLY!"

"Sir it's alright, I was just supervising the decorating, it's going smoothly. We should be done late tonight, which will give us all of tomorrow to prepare the food." Your friend (who's name I will leave up to somebody else) said in a calm and soothing voice. You felt a little better after hearing that.

"Alright... but I still need to supervise and-"

"No, you are going to go sleep right now! You've been up too much, and if Bowser sees you like this he won't like it." That was shocking to you. Nobody talked that way to you! Except maybe your parents at some point. But then again this was your most trusted friend, and he was right.
13211.title: Severe Stress

choices: "Get some rest. Everything will be fine, trust me."
"Come downstairs, we have a surprise for you."
132111.content:
You breathe a heavy sigh and give into your friend's request. You just can't bear to have him see your physical and mental shape. Another enormous binge due to your constant worrying has put him in a far enough stance that it's his way or the highway.. You lumber across the room and roll onto your bed. Everyone left in the room is amazed that the bed can still contain your weight. After they leave, you finally cry yourself to sleep, thinking about nothing but Bowser's upcoming visit.

Your night is far from sleepless...or dreamless for that matter. You dream that you wake up to seeing Bowser at your bedside. He looms over you unhappily and you immediately begin to stress.

"Oh, uh, Master!" You pull the covers close, "Forgive me but I'm just not ready!"

"Nonsense!" He thunders, "Out of all the loyal chiefs on this island, you're nowhere near worth your weight in gold."

"But I can explain!" You try bargaining with him.

"The only explaining you'll do is when you get back in shape for your job," He snaps his fingers, summoning a Magikoopa inside the room with several large plate of fruit.

"I-I'm not hungry!" You protest but the Magikoopa waves his wand to levitate the fruit and drops it inside your mouth. He does this until the first plate is completely empty and with its contents inside you, you feel your bed start to give way. The Magikoopa keeps force-feeding you food against your will until your bed breaks, causing you to fall into nothingness. While Bowser laughs maniacally, you scream "NOOOO!!" a few times at the top of your lungs...

You wake up in the middle of the night to find that you are back in your bed surrounded by half dozen of your servants along with your friend. It looks as if they are prepared to give you an intervention.

"Are you all right?" Your friend asks, "It was probably all that feasting that did that to you."

You slouch in your bed with tears in your eyes. Everyone else in the room cannot believe what has become of their chief. Your friend looks at your servants, then back at you and says...

1322.content:
"Well of course I'm still bigger, did you think I wouldn't be?" You rub your large stomach and look at the short yoshi questioningly. "We've been friends for ages, you know I like being large. Besides I look more kingly like this, don't I?"

"Oh yes, you definitely do, no question about that. I was merely stating a fact." You give him a skeptical look and continue your walk to the dining hall.

You two continue your conversation normally as you stroll towards the hall. During the walk, a servant yoshi appears with a platter in his hands.

"Oh! Sire there you are! The chef wanted me to find you so you could try the food we will be serving at the banquet. He wasn't sure what Bowser, or you, might like, so he made a lot. This is just the appetizers here, I'll show you to the rest." He balanced the large plate on one hand and made an awkward bow as he motioned for you to follow.

The walk didn't take long, but just long enough for you to finish the entire plate. "Hmm... that was quite tasty. Make sure the chef knows that I find this delicious." The thinish servant gave another short bow as he opened the doors for you.

During the walk, your friend had noticed something. You weren't panicking as much, if at all. Your worries seemed to have just melted away when you started talking about your weight and food. Maybe you would be willing to sleep or at least take a nap after you were done with his taste testing.

You enter the dining hall where a large amount of food was set up on the huge table, with the chef and his assistants waiting for you to sit down. You walk (bit of a waddle after those appetizers) to the large chair you use when dining. The chair was very large, it could probably seat a good bit more of you.

"Good morning sire! We are delighted that you have decided to come test the food for us. We could have tested it ourselves, but it would probably not have met your expectations." They all bow low, except the chef who couldn't bend that far and started uncovering the food. "As you can see we have a little of everything made and more. Plenty of different types of food for you to try, and we await your critique."

Being the leader of Yoshi's Island can take it's toll on a Yoshi's body, just look at the pictures of your ancestors!

This IS a weight gain oriented interactive and other interests are allowed to intertwine, but you must warn other readers when you decide to do such.
